metadata.title: CVE-2020-9770 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in iOS 13.4 and iPadOS 13.4. An attacker in a privileged networkposition may be able to intercept Bluetooth traffic.

criterions.comment: bluez package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
